title: WCAS MATH 310-3-31 Probability and Stochastic Processes

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Continuation of 310-2. Markov processes in continuous time, stationary process, second-order process, stochastic differential equations. Students may not receive credit for both 310-1 and any of 385, EECS 302, IEMS 202, or STAT 320-1, 383. Prerequisites: 234, 240.

THIS COURSE HAS MANDATORY EVENING MIDTERM EXAMINATIONS AT 6PM ON APRIL 28 AND MAY 19. PLEASE CHECK THE REGISTRAR'S WEBPAGE FOR DETAILS: http://www.registrar.northwestern.edu/registration/midterms.html

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
ISBN: 978-0881332674 Introduction to Stochastic Processes
Hoel and Port
Waveland

subject: MATH
